description: Colombia’s government and the largest rebel group in the country have reached a deal to end more than 50 years of conflict. Nicholas Casey, Andes bureau chief, looks back at the history of the conflict.
title: Colombia and FARC Make Peace
title_page: Colombia and FARC Make Peace - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Colombia’s government and the largest rebel group in the country have reached a deal to end more than 50 years of conflict. Nicholas Casey, Andes bureau chief, looks back at the history of the conflict.
